Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>A traveler? <sp:5:0:0>Welcome! <sp:5:0:0>What can I do for
you this morning?
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>A traveler?<sp:5:0:0> Welcome!<sp:5:0:0> What can I do for
you this evening?
Talk1003_01:
This <clr:0000>golden horse<clr:ffff>? <sp:5:0:0>My, you do have a
discerning eye! <sp:5:0:0>This beautiful creature is
no ordinary horse.
<snd:Happy_01>It was discovered, tamed, and boarded by
none other than <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> herself!
Oh, how the princess adores this horse.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>And the horse loves her too! You should
have seen them riding around togetherâ€”
it was enough to take your breath away!
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_01>The poor thing's been so anxious ever
since Princess Zelda went missing.

It's always trying to go out, no matter how
late into the night. It's like the horse just
can't relax.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>My theory is that it's trying to go search
for the princess.<sp:5:0:0> Devotion like that's
nearly enough to break your heart.
Near02: I hope the horse is OK...
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>This <clr:0000>golden horse<clr:ffff> is no ordinary horse,<sp:5:0:0>
but one tamed by <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> herself!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You could see the love they had for each
other every time they went out riding.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Which just makes it more heartbreaking to
see how anxious the poor thing has been
since Princess Zelda went missing.
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Brrr!<sp:5:0:0> You must be freezing,<sp:5:0:0> trudging
through all that snow to get here!
Talk1006_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>As long as the princess's horse is happy,
I'm happy too!<sp:0:4:0>I think it's more likely to be reunited with
Princess Zelda if it's with you.<sp:0:4:0>Besides, adventuring is probably a lot
more exciting than waiting around at this
stable! <sp:5:0:0>Just give it some love for me, OK?
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>You found the <clr:0000>golden horse<clr:ffff>! Thank you,
thank you, thank you!

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>When the princess's horse disappeared, it
felt as if the world around me went dark.

I just kept thinking of how heartbroken
Princess Zelda would have been if she
came back and her horse was lost.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_01>Please love and cherish that horse like
the princess herself would, OK?
Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I hope you and the princess's horse have
been getting along!

<sp:3:0:2:0301>While I miss being able to brush that
beautiful golden coat whenever I want...

I think the horse has a better chance of
being reunited with Princess Zelda if it's
with you.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>Just give it some love for me, OK?
LargeHorse: Will that fit in the stable?
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>A traveler? <sp:5:0:0>Welcome! What can I do for
you today?
